channel.title: Yu-Chieh UJ Kuo
channel.description: Recent content on Yu-Chieh UJ Kuo

item.title: YU-Chieh Kuo
item.description: Brief Introduction -- -- I am a junior student double major in the Department of Information Management and the Department of Mathematics at National Taiwan University, NTU. I am interested in the field regarding the combination of technology and social science for social good, including Data Science, Economics, Information Management/Science and Social Computing, etc. Currently I am working with Prof. Lin-Shan Lee on web development, and Prof. Seng-cho T. Chou on a web-service based on block-chain.
